about.name: Carlos Mario Toro Martinez
about.description: Backend-oriented Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of hands-on experience building production systems for real businesses. I specialize in API-driven architectures, relational databases, system integrations, and practical microservices approaches focused on reliability, maintainability, and real operational needs.
